name: Can't Hide
description:
Hello! can you hear me?

Figured you'd be in that place, I really don't understand why you keep going back there over, and over again.

You have to stop doing this, it's too dangerous! If they find you then you'll be in big trouble. I'm going to come get you, all you have to do is make your way to the office.

Stay there until I arrive. It shouldn't take long, See you soon, M.
